Uses of Codec in com.dhemery.network
 

Constructors in com.dhemery.network with parameters of type Codec
CodecEndpoint(Endpoint endpoint, Codec codec)
          Create an endpoint that uses the Codec to serialize and deserialize objects transmitted through another endpoint.
